snippet: Turkey’s foreign minister reported increased Syrian military attacks near the border and a relentless influx of refugees from Syria on Friday.
abstract: Turkey's foreign minister Ahmed Davutoglu tells United Nations that violence in Syria is worsening just days before a proposed cease-fire is to take effect.
lead_paragraph: Turkey’s foreign minister reported increased Syrian military attacks near the border and a relentless influx of refugees from Syria on Friday.
